text: No One Writes to the Colonel () is a 1999 French Spanish Mexican drama movie directed by Arturo Ripstein and is based on the 1961 novella of the same name by Gabriel Garcia Marquez. It stars Fernando Luján, Marisa Paredes, Salma Hayek, Rafael Inclán, Ernesto Yáñez, Daniel Giménez Cacho, Esteban Soberanes, Patricia Reyes Spíndola, Odiseo Bichir, Julián Pastor, Eugenio Lobo. == Other websites == * * * Category:1999 drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Arturo Ripstein
